title: AfgRefugees - Turkey
subtitle:
Refugees boat report from #Turkey to #Greece 
01 January 2017 - 18 September 2019

- 2.419 Boats (carrying 87.084 #refugees) arrived in #Greek islands
- 3.214 Boats (carrying 114.823 refugees) stopped by Turkish Coast Guard and returned back to Turkey

By: #Ageanboatreportpic.twitter.com/UOmWwWn4DG
